channel.title: Black Mesa Playthrough and Personal Unofficial Trailer
channel.description:
I am a video editor and Youtuber, and I spend a lot of my time creating content for people. Lately I've been pretty slow on channel growth, and I never thought once to share it with the community that actually made the game. Whether or not it's the right thing to do, I guess I'll show you guys the Unofficial Trailer I made along with the first part of my let's play of Black Mesa.
Trailer I made: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TI4_IrodfnA[/url]
Part 1 of Black Mesa Playthrough: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CEZg361W13s[/url]
Part 1 of Half Life 2 playthrough: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EH2k1uI1Ieg[/url]
Tell me what you think either on the video comments or on the forum. :smiley: . Honest critique please, but don't just say "I hate it". Tell me why, like for example that you think my general approach on editing was bad, my choice of scenes, or maybe even my commentary. Anything helps me approve.

item.title: Black Mesa Playthrough and Personal Unofficial Trailer
item.dc:creator: SovPrussian
item.description:
#bumpdatpost

Thanks for watching my videos guys, it really got me some views on my channel, and I’d appreciate that you check out my Half Life 2 Playthrough I started a few days ago. You can see it here.

Half Life 2 Part 1: Point Insertion
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EH2k1uI1Ieg

If you’d like to see more, it’s always helpful to subscribe and show your friends, I work hard to make these videos.

Part 2 will be up with Part 3 tonight as I had to take part 2 down because it had some “editing problems”. I had left a small clip at the end 8 minutes after the end of the video, and it black screened to that section.

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa Playthrough and Personal Unofficial Trailer

item.title: Black Mesa Playthrough and Personal Unofficial Trailer

item.description:
Well, let’s say everyone has to start somehow… personally, I can’t do a shit, so wouldn’t be fair to criticize. It’s not bad, but it’s neither good.
